players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I believe we should focus on finding the mafia among us. Given what happened last night, I think it's important that we all be vigilant and work together to identify any suspicious behavior."

You: "I will keep my silence, as I have no new information to share. However, I believe it's important for us to continue being cautious and observant of each other's behavior."
